description: Works to trees in front garden subject to Mildmay No.2 TPO 1977 - Lime (T70)    : Crown lift to 4m, crown thin 35%, remove                 horizontal laterals growing over garden and                 deadwood; Chestnut (T71): Crown lift to 4m, crown thin 25%, remove                 horizontal laterals growing over garden and                 deadwood; Chestnut (T72): Crown lift to 4m, crown thin 25%, remove                 horizontal laterals growing over garden and                 deadwood; Lime (T73)    : Crown lift to 4m, crown thin 35%, remove                 horizontal laterals growing over garden and                 deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
